section.title: Components
section.para: DocBook requires a DTD, XSLTPROC, and FOP. In addition, Apache's FOP requires a Java subsystem. The components are as follows:

listitem.para: XSLTPROC – XML processor which reads the XML source and produces Formatted Objects (FOs)
Java – Runtime environment for Apache FOP
FOP – Apache's Formatted Object Processor which transforms FOs to output file types such as HTML, PS, and PDF
FOP-HYPH – used by FOP to hyphenate words in a DocBook
